entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to snow mixed with rain this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and then to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
